messages.subject: Re: [Parody] Real Samurai of Genius
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Bunneh (^_^). I really miss having my microphone--then I could do an mp3 for Real Samurai of Genius :: LOL ::
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Bunneh (^_^).

I really miss having my microphone--then I could do an mp3 for "Real
Samurai of Genius" :: LOL ::

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] [Parody] Real Samurai of Genius
messages.msgSnippet: Wow... I feel like I haven t been here for so long... actually I haven t.  But after all the finals and hectic year, if feels good to read through all these
messages.messageBody:
Wow... I feel like I haven't been here for so long... actually I haven't. But after all the finals and hectic year, if feels good to read through all these 500+ messages I have and then find this lil gem. I loves it! I'm surprised no one else had said anything about it. This really made my day.

*two thumbs up*

-Bunneh

secretary <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:
It's one of these commercials:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZHNt9rXSsTM
which has a narrator and singer alternating--the singer's words are in
(parenthesis).

Sake light presents: Real samurai of genius

(real samurai of genius)

Today we salute you Serizawa Kamo

(Mr. I solve all my problems with violence)

You invent new ways to use an iron fans and won't take any sh*t from
sumo wrestlers

(He has anger management issues)

Only a man named 'Wild Duck' like Serizawa would dare to go fishing in
a temple pond

(those stupid koi deserve to die)

Some may ask, is Serizawa-sensei a suitable leader for a group of
warriors?

(everyone listens to a man who uses a cannon in the city)

It takes episodes of insanity to do what you do Serizawa Kamo, but it
takes more guts to do it and think you'll get away with it. So down a
bottle of sake, mighty chief of heavy artillery---this one's for you.






---------------------------------
Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile. Try it now.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
